name: Hyper Space
description:
Hyper Space is a “Dodge ’Em Up” Arcade game. Collect stars while avoiding space hazards to reach the highest score, unlock new skins, compete with your friends and travel through space to the most distant galaxies.



“Easy to learn, hard to master” to go further and achieve the highest score you need to drive with mastery. Control your spaceship through a mysterious universe collecting stars and skillfully dodging asteroids, satellites, black holes and more!

FEATURES:

  • Fast and engaging gameplay.
  • Score as much as you can with the Arcade-style combo system.
  • Have fun competing against your friends in Multiplayer VS Mode.
  • Remote Play Together support.
  • Adventure yourself in a story mode with illustrated scenes and boss battles.
  • Unlock new skins.
  • Chilling soundtrack.



Explore the universe of Hyper Space at the speed of light and dive into an intergalactic journey full of challenges and discoveries.
Get ready for an experience that will take your piloting skills to new heights.
